partnersresourceslatest newsinsights and case studiescontact uswelcome to network platforms:empowering managed services providers, isps, and wispsat network platforms, we specialize in providing high-quality backend systems to managed services providers (msps), internet service providers (isps), and wireless internet service providers (wisps). our comprehensive solutions are designed to improve your customer offerings and streamline your operations. with a focus on our enterprise virtual server or virtual datacentre environment, ip transit, national long distance connectivity, and wholesale voice rates, we are committed to delivering exceptional services tailored to your specific needs. learn more why isps and wisps are selecting network platforms ip transit (ipt)?network platforms stands out in the ip transit market with our purpose-built service, specifically designed to meet the needs of south african isps (internet service providers) and wisps. we understand the importance of offering customers the best possible experience, and that's why our ip transit service is tailored to deliver exceptional performance. with a focus on south africa, we provide optimized connectivity to all global destinations such as south america, the united states, europe, the far east, and australasia. our reliable network infrastructure, coupled with dedicated support, ensures that isps and wisps can provide their customers with superior connectivity and a seamless online experience. learn more what sets our national long distance (nld) between the teraco datacentre apart? our national long-distance service between the teraco datacentre stands out for a number of reasons. firstly, we have implemented three different providers between teraco ct1 and jb1, as well as between teraco db1 and jb1. this strategic approach ensures optimal performance and reliability. one of the key advantages we offer is unrivalled uptime. our service guarantees an exceptional level of reliability, allowing you to stay connected without interruptions. learn more we provide the option of a protected service, which encompasses all three paths, or you can choose a specific path for an unprotected service, based on your individual requirements, while leveraging our preferential rates due to the volume of capacity. unlike many of our competitors who typically offer only two independent paths, we go above and beyond by providing three distinct paths. this gives you greater flexibility and enhances the overall resilience of our service. learn more about our national long distance service today. need enterprise-grade virtual servers to host your customer applications?as a network platforms virtual platform cloud verified partner, we offer a wide range of exceptional advantages to empower your business. as an esteemed partner, we guarantee the highest standards of reliability, security, and compliance. our rigorous testing and verification processes ensure optimal infrastructure performance, giving you the peace of mind you deserve. with network platforms as your network platforms virtual platform cloud verified partner, you can confidently embrace the cloud with complete trust in our proven solutions. benefit from our advanced security measures, robust data protection, and unwavering commitment to compliance. experience the transformative power of the cloud with network platforms, your dedicated partner for success. explore our virtual servers today. learn more why managed service providers (msps) partner with network platforms?msps are able to expand their services, access advanced technologies, and enhance brand recognition by partnering with network platforms. collaborating with us allows msps to offer comprehensive solutions, leverage scalable infrastructures, and deliver high-quality networking services. partnering with network platforms enables msps to focus on their core competencies while benefiting from our expertise. for example, by tagging public ip subnets, msps can display their company name during customer speed tests, strengthening their brand presence. this partnership empowers msps to provide superior services and establish a reputable brand identity. learn more need advanced technical support for core switching and routing infrastructure?we offer advanced technical support for core switching and routing infrastructure. our services cover cisco and mikrotik equipment, handling complex tasks such as managing bgp and ospf protocols. our skilled professionals provide proactive monitoring, troubleshooting, and maintenance to ensure smooth network operations. with our support, you can extend your team and have peace of mind knowing that your infrastructure is in capable hands. contact us казань.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eновый маршрут на базе dwdm соединяет столицы республики башкортостан и республики татарстан, обеспечивая доступ ко всем основным точкам присутствия в азии, россии и европе. это продолжение однородной линейной системы infinera dwdm протяженностью 695 км с использованием современных когерентных систем без применения компенсаторов дисперсии. пропускная способность 8 тбит/с, установленная для использования в данный момент, может быть оперативно увеличена до 32 тбит/с. дмитрий лопата, коммерческий директор retn в россии (retnnet): \"уфа — казань — уникальный альтернативный маршрут, предоставляющий клиентам доступ к полному набору услуг компании retn с высокой пропускной способностью и доступностью сервисов. мы стремимся помогать нашим многочисленным партнерам с сетевыми решениями, а также продолжаем развивать собственную магистральную сеть, обеспечивая полный доступ к услугам retn на всём ее протяжении.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eсправка о компании retn в россии\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eretnnetвходит в международную группу компаний retn, ведущего международного поставщика сетевых услуг в евразийском регионе. в россии retnnet уже более 18 лет предоставляет сетевые услуги компаниям, работающим в сфере информационных технологий и программного обеспечения, в финансовом, банковском секторе, в области электронной коммерции и транспорта, а также является надежным партнером местных операторов связи и облачных провайдеров.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eсправка о компании retn\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eretn — один из наиболее быстрорастущих независимых евразийских поставщиков услуг ip-транзита и доступа в интернет для бизнеса, обладающий уникальными ресурсами, позволяющими связывать европу и азию. отличительными чертами сети retn являются ее собственная международная оптоволоконная сеть — около 800 точек присутствия и протяженность сети 120\u0026nbsp;447 км, функционирующая на базе таких признанных поставщиков оборудования, как infinera, juniper и ciena. уникальное решение компании retn для подключения европы и азии построено на ее собственной однородной сетевой платформе dwdm и ip/mpls, а также в широком диапазоне наземных маршрутов, проходящих через западную и восточную европу, россию и казахстан до границы с китаем и далее в юго-восточную азию. компания retn предоставляет телекоммуникационные услуги по всей своей евразийской сети с коротким сроком выполнения заказов, одним из самых высоких показателей бесперебойной работы сети на рынке и многоуровневым резервированием\u0026nbsp;для 1500 своих style=\"color: black;\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: black;\"\u003eнаряду с открытием новых представительств в регионе retn стратегически развивает свою сеть, открывая новый dwdm маршрут резекне - даугавплис - вильнюс, один из самых коротких существующих маршрутов для соединения вильнюса с москвой и периодом круговой задержки всего 10,71 мс. он также улучшает резервирование сети для столицы литвы, добавляя третий маршрут, идущий в вильнюс. в более широком масштабе этот маршрут дополняет проект transkz, соединяя европу и азию в качестве дублирующего, но равного по времени круговой задержки между москвой и варшавой.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: black;\"\u003eучасток даугавпилс-вильнюс стал вторым трансграничным маршрутом retn между латвией и литвой, способствуя дальнейшей интеграции ит и коммуникаций между странами ес. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: black;\"\u003eсреди других недавних инвестиций retn в скандинавско-балтийском регионе можно назвать наем инженеров, сотрудников в отдел продаж и разработки (r\u0026amp;d) в швеции, финляндии и латвии, направленный на укрепление существующих команд специалистов и использование как местного, так и глобального опыта. retn продолжает свою экспансию, чтобы гарантировать высочайший уровень обслуживания и сервиса для клиентов, обеспечивая быструю, безопасную и надежную связь в европе и азии. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: black;\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color: black;\"\u003eо компании retn\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: black;\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eretn – один из самых быстрорастущих независимых евразийских поставщиков услуг ip-транзита и корпоративных коммуникаций, обладающий уникальными ресурсами для соединения европы и азии. отличительной особенностью сети retn является собственная международная оптоволоконная сеть, насчитывающая около 800 точек присутствия с общей протяженностью сети \u003cspan style=\"color: black;\"\u003e120 447 \u003c/span\u003eкм. retn сотрудничает с ведущими поставщиками оборудования - infinera, juniper и ciena.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eуникальное решение retn, связывающее европу и азию, основано на собственной однородной dwdm технологии и широко разветвленных наземных маршрутах, проходящих через западную европу, а также через украину, россию и казахстан до границы с китаем, а далее в юго-восточную азию.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eдля 1500 клиентов retn предоставляет в кратчайшие сроки запускает last mile over ip","more_description":"\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: black;\"\u003eлондон, 20 октября 2021 г. сегодня международный поставщик сетевых услуг retn представляет собственную разработку last mile over ip (lmoip) в качестве простого и эффективного решения для клиентов, желающих усовершенствовать свою сеть и инфраструктуру, с возможностью модернизации и расширения в будущем. lmoip представлена на крупнейшей в европе конференции в сфере телекоммуникаций capacity europe.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: black;\"\u003e \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cimg src=\"data:image/png;base64,\"\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: black;\"\u003eс помощью retn lmoip клиенты смогут использовать свой существующий доступ к сети интернет для подключения к сетевой платформе retn благодаря устройству retn ucpe. это небольшое устройство легко и безопасно подключается пользователем и мгновенно обеспечивает доступ к сетевой платформе retn. клиенты могут повысить отказоустойчивость за счет возможностей резервного копирования, таких как lte/4g, что обеспечивает гарантированную непрерывность функционирования бизнеса.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: black;\"\u003eосновные характеристики lmoip:\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: black;\"\u003e·\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;автоматическая настройка: легкая установка оборудования без необходимости привлечения специалистов. retn поставляет ucpe с простыми инструкциями, и после подключения к соответствующему каналу связи устройство безопасно загрузит сервисную конфигурацию услуги;\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: black;\"\u003e·\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;быстрое переключение между основным и резервным каналами связи: при такой конфигурации аварийное переключение осуществляется в течении нескольких секунд, что обеспечивает бесперебойное функционирование услуги;\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: black;\"\u003e·\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;поддержка ipv6: полная поддержка с использованием двойного стека для ipv4 и ipv6;\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: black;\"\u003e·\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;безопасность: шифрование ip-sec обеспечивает безопасность ваших данных;\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: black;\"\u003e·\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;firewall: ucpe устройство поддерживает функционал firewall с динамической фильтрацией пакетов.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: black;\"\u003eклиенты, использующие традиционные физические телекоммуникационные сети, основанные преимущественно на mpls, сталкиваются со множеством ограничений, таких как длительный срок инсталляции услуги, отсутствие возможности модернизации и вариантов резервирования. большинство этих ограничений происходит из-за того, что локальные каналы обеспечиваются несколькими поставщиками: даже если официально провайдер один, фактически их часто бывает два и более.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: black;\"\u003elmoip позволяет избежать этих ограничений. надежность и непрерывность функционирования бизнеса обеспечивается в сочетании с дополнительными услугами, такими как lte/4g или традиционным каналом связи. сервис lmoip может быть установлен в течении 1-2 рабочих дней и будет значительно дешевле традиционного физического доступа, обеспечивая при этом полный контроль и прозрачность. и последнее, но не менее важное: lmoip обеспечивает простой способ подключения к обширной сети retn.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: black;\"\u003e«компания retn вложила значительные средства в разработку этого решения, мы усовершенствовали его функционал, обновили решение в соответствии с меняющимися потребностями рынка и теперь рады анонсировать его запуск! после года тестирования с участием клиентов, продукт появится в продаже на этой неделе. этот продукт представляет\u0026nbsp;новым и существующим корпоративным клиентам принципиально новый способ получения доступа к первоклассному и признанному клиентами сервису retn», — комментирует исполнительный директор компании тони о'салливан (tony o' sullivan). — обширная сеть retn по всей европе и азии, а также контроль за базовой инфраструктурой dwdm и ip/mpls позволяют компании retn достигать одного из самых коротких на рынке сроков по подключению клиентов, обеспечивая при этом непрерывное обновление магистральной сети в целях удовлетворения растущего спроса. компания retn, подключенная к наиболее важным интернет-биржам и провайдерам облачных сервисов, предлагает одно из наиболее комплексных средств сетевого взаимодействия и непрерывно расширяет свою линейку продуктов для поддержания темпов технологического развития рынка. теперь клиенты могут пользоваться преимуществами нашей сети, подключившись к ней с lmoip».\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color: black;\"\u003eо компании retn\u003c/strong\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: valorizamos sua privacidade

utilizamos cookies para aprimorar sua experiência de navegação, exibir anúncios ou conteúdo personalizado e analisar nosso tráfego. ao clicar em “aceitar todos”, você concorda com nosso uso de cookies.

personalizar preferências de consentimento

utilizamos cookies para ajudar você a navegar com eficiência e executar certas funções. você encontrará informações detalhadas sobre todos os cookies sob cada categoria de consentimento abaixo.

os cookies que são classificados com a marcação “necessário” são armazenados em seu navegador, pois são essenciais para possibilitar o uso de funcionalidades básicas do site.

também usamos cookies de terceiros que nos ajudam a analisar como você usa esse site, armazenar suas preferências e fornecer conteúdo e anúncios que sejam relevantes para você. esses cookies somente serão armazenados em seu navegador mediante seu prévio consentimento.

você pode optar por ativar ou desativar alguns ou todos esses cookies, mas desativá-los pode afetar sua experiência de navegação.

sempre ativo

os cookies necessários são cruciais para as funções básicas do site e o site não funcionará como pretendido sem eles.

esses cookies não armazenam nenhum dado pessoalmente identificável.

sem cookies para exibir.

sempre ativo

cookies funcionais ajudam a executar certas funcionalidades, como compartilhar o conteúdo do site em plataformas de mídia social, coletar feedbacks e outros recursos de terceiros.

sem cookies para exibir.

sempre ativo

cookies analíticos são usados para entender como os visitantes interagem com o site. esses cookies ajudam a fornecer informações sobre métricas o número de visitantes, taxa de rejeição, fonte de tráfego, etc.

sem cookies para exibir.

sempre ativo

os cookies de desempenho são usados para entender e analisar os principais índices de desempenho do site, o que ajuda a oferecer uma melhor experiência do usuário para os visitantes.

sem cookies para exibir.

sempre ativo

os cookies de anúncios são usados para entregar aos visitantes anúncios personalizados com base nas páginas que visitaram antes e analisar a eficácia da campanha publicitária.

sem cookies para exibir.

to ensure their users experience smooth, uninterrupted gameplay. any delay or disruption can lead to significant user dissatisfaction and impact the reputation of both providers and their clients, ultimately leading to lower spend per user. additionally, the global reach of these games means that i3d.net needs to provide consistent performance across different geographic regions, which poses a significant and ongoing need in terms of network stability, path diversification and low latency.\u003c/p\u003e"},"solution":{"title":"solution","text_title":null,"text_content":"\u003cp\u003eretn provides \u003ca href=\"https://www.i3d.net/gaming-industry/\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ei3d.net\u003c/a\u003e with cutting-edge dwdm transmission services and strategic colocation services, significantly boosting network quality and availability of the network by ensuring high-capacity, low-latency connectivity between i3d.net's points of presence (pops), which is critical for maintaining the high performance required by their gaming clients.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003ewhen i3d.net needed to expand into eastern europe, retn's proactive and transparent ticket updates during incidents and direct engineering support proved invaluable. retn ensured connectivity and presence in several countries, providing additional assistance with critical router deployments in regions where i3d.net personnel weren’t present. retn's solution also included handling maintenance scenarios, rescheduling or finding workarounds to minimise impact, and proactively sharing updates with i3d.net to allow for effective planning and path redundancy.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003ein addition to the transmission services, retn's colocation services provided i3d.net with the necessary infrastructure to host their network equipment in strategic locations. this allowed i3d.net to maintain a high level of control over their network performance and ensure optimal routing of data, further reducing latency and improving the overall gaming experience for their clients.\u003c/p\u003e"},"quotes":[{"name":"martijn schmidt","rank":"vp of network, with new products to improve customer connectivity. retn became an official partner with the major international ixps to provide remote peering services routes throughout europe (madrid-marseille; the shortest fiber connection hamburg-frankfurt etc.). always expanding with more new pops in asia and north america. taking on the metro in riga. acquisition of optron sia, a fiber based metro network service provider in riga, latvia. moscow dwdm ring launched. continuous development of metro networks in europe. investments in the core continued: 5 routes from europe into russia. network developments in baltics: new high-speed fiber route moscow-riga launched, followed by the second subsea connection project by completing southern way and dwdm route via belarus. a truly eurasian company. retn offices opened in taipei, tbilisi and yerevan to serve the new markets and deliver better global connectivity and services. international recognition. retn was granted a number of significant industry awards: transkz won “project of the year – terrestrial” by global carrier awards; retn ukraine infinera ice4 and flexils on core routes in europe, preparing for the next generation of dwdm transportation. ip network was moved to the latest generation juniper mx10k core. ciena waveserver 5 was deployed for the first time. securing the internet. retn was one of the first major ip transit networks to support rpki, to reduce spoofing and route leaks. a new focus on enterprise customers with the addition of enterprise centric products such as cloud connect and layer 7 ddos mitigation.\u003c/p\u003e"},{"caption":null,"paragraph":"\u003cp\u003edeveloping the future of enterprise access. system in belarus. the first non-belarussian carrier to do so, the first and only contiguous low latency dwdm system from europe to the chinese border. deployment of dwdm in moldova. new path brno-budapest, unique and redundant. increasing access opportunities in core global locations. new metro networks interconnecting dcs in amsterdam, london, and tokyo. more ways to interconnect with retn. retn headed south when it opened its first office in southern europe in milan. additional pops in rome, paris, and milan. major capacity upgrades into madrid, marseille and milan.\u003c/p\u003e"}],"facts":[{"firstnum":"1500+","firsttext":"\u003cp\u003eclients\u003c/p\u003e","secondnum":"18","secondtext":"\u003cp\u003eoffices\u003c/p\u003e"},{"firstnum":"865+","firsttext":"\u003cp\u003epops\u003c/p\u003e","secondnum":"40","secondtext":"\u003cp\u003eterritories\u003c/p\u003e"},{"firstnum":"132 the best pan-european carrier","texts":[{"caption":"\u003cp\u003ebecoming the best pan-european carrier\u003c/p\u003e","paragraph":"\u003cp\u003eadversity breeds strength. with a major war starting in one of retn’s key markets, the company had to demonstrate its ability to act under pressure, playing a crucial role in maintaining internet connectivity and telecoms infrastructure in ukraine.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003ethe resilient design of the retn network came to the fore during the worst days. despite the active war actions, we developed a new route lutsk-monastyrysche to provide a redundant path towards europe, and found time to support numerous charitable causes for children in ukraine, our colleagues and loved ones. none of this could have been achieved without local infrastructure partners and other european telcos whose staff went out into the missile craters.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003esimultaneously, retn pursued strategic expansion across europe and asia, opening new offices in vilnius, singapore, helsinki, yerevan and sofia, to better support local clients and our many network developments.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e"},{"caption":null,"paragraph":"\u003cp\u003ein the baltic corridor we added riga-daugavpils, riga-gotland-stockholm, a new lower latency route stockholm-helsinki and a second diverse path warsaw-poznan-berlin, improving connectivity around the baltic sea and massively increasing diversity back to western europe. polish businesses benefited from the new warsaw metro ring, poznan, and tallinn pops.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003esouthern europe, western europe and asia were not forgotten with major projects connecting budapest-belgrade-sofia-timisoara-budapest; more leased capacity to budapest, iasi and istanbul; new low latency fibre london-paris; additional subsea capacity across south east asia and new pops in london, rotterdam and singapore; and in italy bringing rome and padua on-net, with 4 new pops in the local market.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eretn expanded its enterprise offerings with direct off-ramps to google and oracle cloud and qualified as a dell technologies gold solution provider. as a testament to all our efforts, retn was awarded best pan-european carrier at the global carrier awards 2023, the most widely respected industry awards organisation.\u003c/p\u003e"}],"facts":[{"firstnum":"18","firsttext":"\u003cp\u003eoffices\u003c/p\u003e","secondnum":null,"secondtext":null},{"firstnum":"870+","firsttext":"\u003cp\u003epops\u003c/p\u003e","secondnum":"41","secondtext":"\u003cp\u003eterritories\u003c/p\u003e"},{"firstnum":"135 the network of tomorrow","texts":[{"caption":"\u003cp\u003ebuilding the network of tomorrow\u003c/p\u003e","paragraph":"\u003cp\u003efollowing retn’s recognition as the ‘best pan-european carrier,’ we intensified our efforts to advance global connectivity with major expansions in asia and europe. we doubled capacity in southeast asia, introduced new routes in turkey and the middle east, and added high-capacity links across northern and western europe. we invested in alternative infrastructure developments in southern europe, poland, croatia, denmark, sweden, and georgia, increasing reliability and bypassing traditional routes to add redundancy. paths such as milan–zurich exemplified our commitment to providing diverse, low-latency routes for critical industries like finance. in the uk, retn expanded with new points of presence in manchester, enhancing local enterprises’ access to our global backbone and supporting the uk’s northern powerhouse with cutting-edge connectivity.\u003c/p\u003e"},{"caption":null,"paragraph":"\u003cp\u003ein a world shaped by rising geopolitical tensions, environmental challenges, and rapid technological change, the resilience of global network infrastructure is more critical than ever! our ‘building the network of tomorrow’ message to the industry underscored the urgent need for investment in robust infrastructure and the development of diversified, resilient routes. in the wake of disruptions caused by the red sea cable cuts, retn urged the industry to prioritise resilience and customer-focused solutions to safeguard the future of global connectivity.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;our commitment to shaping the future of the internet was evident in several key initiatives. we advanced our ipv6 rollout, equipping customers to leverage the modern internet protocols for enhanced performance and scalability. additionally, we launched a state-of-the-art ddos protection platform, featuring cutting-edge ai threat detection and mitigation capabilities. alongside these achievements, we continued investing in the latest networking equipment, reinforcing our dedication to delivering industry-leading infrastructure and services.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;at the 2024 global connectivity awards, we were honoured with the title of ‘innovation disruptor of the year,’ recognising our role in shaping the future of global connectivity.\u003c/p\u003e"}],"facts":[{"firstnum":"17","firsttext":"\u003cp\u003eoffices\u003c/p\u003e","secondnum":null,"secondtext":null},{"firstnum":"970+","firsttext":"\u003cp\u003epops\u003c/p\u003e","secondnum":"44","secondtext":"\u003cp\u003eterritories\u003c/p\u003e"},{"firstnum":"140 named best pan-european connectivity provider at the global connectivity awards 2025","more_description":"\u003cp\u003elondon, uk - october 23, 2025 - \u003ca href=\"http://www.retn.net/\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eretn\u003c/a\u003e has been awarded \u003cstrong\u003ebest pan-european connectivity provider\u003c/strong\u003e at the global connectivity awards 2025, held last night at the o2 in london. the award recognises retn’s continued leadership in network innovation, resilience, and sustainable infrastructure development across europe and beyond.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003ethe accolade reflects retn’s transformation of what pan-european connectivity means in 2025: not just scale, but resilience, responsibility, and readiness for the future. over the last year, retn has expanded its proprietary backbone to \u003cstrong\u003e140,000 km across 44 countries\u003c/strong\u003e, now featuring more than \u003cstrong\u003e970 points of presence (pops)\u003c/strong\u003e and multiple new high-capacity terrestrial and subsea routes.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003ethe judges commented: \u003cem\u003e“the pan-european provider secured the award by redefining network resilience through a unique blend of terrestrial expansion and sustainable hardware innovation in 2024/2025. the novel achievement is europe’s largest rollout of 400gbe coherent pluggable optics across its network.”\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eamong its key achievements, retn:\u003c/p\u003e\u003cul\u003e\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eexpanded new markets\u003c/strong\u003e in greece, turkey, croatia, and the middle east.\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eintegrated the marseille–milan medloop subsea cable\u003c/strong\u003e, adding new low-latency, high-resilience alternatives between southern and western europe.\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003edelivered new backbone builds\u003c/strong\u003e such as milan–zurich, padua–vienna, and marseille–madrid.\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eexpanded metro networks\u003c/strong\u003e in warsaw, frankfurt, and amsterdam to enhance local loop diversity.\u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ul\u003e\u003cp\u003ein parallel, retn completed \u003cstrong\u003eeurope’s largest rollout of 400gbe coherent pluggable optics\u003c/strong\u003e across its ip/mpls and dwdm networks - powered by juniper ptx and infinera ice-x platforms. this milestone reduces energy usage by 40%, cuts carbon emissions by over 50%, and increases available capacity to 100 tbps.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003ethe company also introduced an \u003cstrong\u003eai-powered ddos mitigation platform\u003c/strong\u003e that boosts scrubbing capacity by 5000%, integrating advanced cybersecurity capabilities into its ip transit and dia services as standard.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003etony o’sullivan, ceo of retn\u003c/strong\u003e, commented: \u003cem\u003e“this recognition reflects the expertise and commitment of our teams across europe and asia. retn is building more than a network - we’re building the resilient digital foundation that our customers and partners rely on. this award reinforces our belief that reliability, sustainability, and innovation can and must go hand in hand.”\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003ethe win follows retn’s recognition as \u003cstrong\u003einnovation disruptor of the year 2024,\u003c/strong\u003e and more recently, as the recipient of \u003cstrong\u003ethe tech capital digital infrastructure action award\u003c/strong\u003e launches flex ix: the industry’s first zero-waste ix \u0026 transit","more_description":"\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003elondon – october 20, 2025 –\u003c/strong\u003e \u003ca href=\"https://bit.ly/4cr6qui\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"color: rgb(5, 99, 193);\"\u003eretn\u003c/a\u003e, the leading independent global network services provider, today announces the launch of\u0026nbsp;\u003cstrong\u003eflex ix\u003c/strong\u003e, a new wholesale connectivity solution that, for the first time, combines remote internet exchange (ix) access and ip transit in a single service.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eretn analysis shows that at least 70% of capacity at industry peering and interconnect points goes unused - highlighting a long-standing inefficiency: ix bandwidth often sits idle when peers are inactive. flex ix solves this by combining remote ix and ip transit on a single port, automatically converting unused peering bandwidth into ip transit with the option to burst beyond the committed rate - allowing operators to fully utilise purchased capacity without the cost and complexity of separate services.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e“this is a first in our industry,” said\u0026nbsp;\u003cstrong\u003etony o’sullivan, ceo of retn\u003c/strong\u003e. “flex ix ends wasted capacity. carriers, isps and content networks can commit once and be certain that their bandwidth is always working for them - whether for peering or transit. it simplifies operations, increases efficiency, and builds resilience into networks.”\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003ekey benefits of flex ix include:\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\u003cul\u003e\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003ezero waste\u003c/strong\u003e\u0026nbsp;- unused ix capacity automatically becomes available for ip transit. \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eresilience by design\u003c/strong\u003e\u0026nbsp;- if a peering partner or ix has an outage, traffic continues over transit (based on bgp setup).\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eone solution\u003c/strong\u003e\u0026nbsp;- peering and transit combined on a single retn port and cdr.\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eglobal reach\u003c/strong\u003e\u0026nbsp;- access to retn’s remote ix portfolio, including: ams-ix (amsterdam), bbix (tokyo, hong kong, singapore), bcix (berlin), bix (budapest), de-cix (frankfurt), dtel-ix (kyiv), espanix (madrid), france-ix (paris), inex (dublin), jpnap (tokyo), jpix (tokyo), linx (london), mix (milan), netnod (stockholm), vix (vienna).\u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ul\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003ewilliam manzione, product manager at retn\u003c/strong\u003e, added: “we designed flex ix because we care about the quality of our customers’ networks. every network buyer knows the frustration: you commit to ix capacity, but traffic patterns shift, peers aren’t always active, and valuable bandwidth sits unused. meanwhile, you’re managing separate contracts for ix and transit, adding cost and complexity. flex ix is designed to address this.”\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003ediscover more about flex ix here: \u003ca href=\"https://retn.net/trending/flexix\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ehttps://retn.net/trending/flexix\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e","more_pictures":[],"link":"","meta_description":""},{"slug":"ipnetwork_geofeed","date":1760486400,"event_date":1760486400,"title":"retn users.\u003c/p\u003e","picture":{"id":3091,"name":"geofeed_article_post_800x455_v1","original_name":"geofeed_article_post_800x455_v1.png","mime":"image/png","extension":"png","size":240959,"sort":0,"path":"news/","description":null,"alt":null,"hash":null,"disk":"public","user_id":2,"group":null,"document_name":null,"is_published":1,"file_lang":null,"is_storage":0,"created_at":"2025-10-15t06:57:50.000000z","updated_at":"2025-10-15t06:57:50.000000z","url":"https://retn.net/storage/news/geofeed_article_post_800x455_v1.png","relativeurl":"/storage/news/geofeed_article_post_800x455_v1.png"},"more_title":"retn strengthens ip network with geofeed","more_description":"\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003edelivering precise, transparent ip location data for better connectivity\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003ewe are excited to announce the successful implementation of geofeed for our ip network! this initiative significantly enhances the accuracy and transparency of our ip geolocation data, benefiting both our partners and users.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003ewhat is geolocation?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003egeolocation is the process of determining the physical location of an ip address. it enables websites and services to deliver localised content, comply with regulations, and improve user experiences. inaccurate data can lead to frustrating access issues.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003ewhy geofeed?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003egeofeed\u0026nbsp;allows network operators to publish accurate location data for their ip prefixes in a standardised format. this benefits both operators and geolocation providers by ensuring accurate ip representation and providing reliable, up-to-date data.\u0026nbsp;📊\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003ekey benefits:\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e✅\u0026nbsp;accuracy \u0026amp; reliability: enhanced control over ip location data, reducing geolocation problems.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e✅\u0026nbsp;simplicity: centralised management of all ip locations for easier updates. \u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e✅\u0026nbsp;improved performance: faster routing decisions and reduced latency. \u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e✅\u0026nbsp;resolved access issues: ensures seamless content delivery. \u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e✅\u0026nbsp;increased transparency: clear insights into ip geolocation data.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e \u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eartur zhitenev, senior noc engineer at retn\u003c/strong\u003e, commented, \"inaccurate geolocation for an ip was one of the problems faced by our noc team quite often. it was challenging to resolve since it involved third-party geolocation providers, which affected the accuracy of ip locations. by implementing\u0026nbsp;geofeed\u0026nbsp;with automation, we can ensure our ip records are up-to-date, optimising the user experience.\"\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003emichael poon, ip engineer at retn\u003c/strong\u003e, added, \"implementing\u0026nbsp;geofeed\u0026nbsp;is a vital step toward a more reliable internet. we not only improve the accuracy of our ip geolocation data but also empower our partners to make informed routing decisions. by standardising ip geolocation data, we can enhance routing accuracy and reduce latency in content delivery. this proactive approach not only streamlines our operations but also aligns with industry best practices.\"\u003c/p\u003e","more_pictures":[],"link":"","meta_description":""},{"slug":"nlnog_2025","date":1759190400,"event_date":1759233600,"title":"tony o’sullivan at nlnog 2025: hardwired for
